I've been asked a lot how I went about setting up my business. Here is my answer; https://t.co/SmDjEbvhlW
@andycroll only if I earn a special @brightonruby badge for it

1 example currently making me cringe. Had an email "my budget is $100"
My reply?
"Cool, what about $85?"
I think @ramit would shoot me
I'm getting better at that type of stuff, still a long way to go.
Related: looking through old emails for advertising deals. I left so much money on the table and didn't chase up relatively large deals...
It is a weird feeling when you want to reach out to old competitors for an ad deal and they are out of business.
@dtopping27 having only just now read she is preggers - I thought this was a sex joke. I mean it still kind of is.
Can't work out why this is news. Has happened to me in any company with more than a handful of folk on the same IP https://t.co/Xw235rrtEU
@MarmiteJunction now now. Don't be so negative. It's half full!
@vyabsley haha, I'm positive I will RT something I didn't fact check before the day is out. Circle of life.

I may run out of HD space before this completes 🤣
I asked my scanner to scan at 3200 instead of 320 dpi and I think it is about to melt.
@RosieCampbell I always go with the classic "So, busy tonight?" then hate myself that little bit more.
@stowball Closer to 30k for places I've seen. It wasn't so much the money, it was the wording of the entire thing.
@padolsey it all feels so terrible. Having to explain to adults that humans are human isn't something I thought I'd ever need to talk about!
@padolsey to be clear, I completely see what you mean and in a just society this thing would be frowned upon.
@padolsey yeah but that appeals to _some_ people, and I think we need to appeal to as many people as possible, including ignorant idiots.
@padolsey I'm not sure that is fair - need to attack this issue from multiple angles, and one is appealing to lost opportunity.
@malevolent_goat cheers for calling this out, we appreciate it! (and sorry it took so long to reply haha!)
@davetron5000 are folk buying with names like Kathy McGreatDeveloper?
@tom_hirst I just like that the lumped three thing (that plenty of folk are good/great at) and you need to be expert in them all!
Haha just read a job ad saying you must be an expert at CSS/HTML/JS and offering £25k. I don't think they know what the word expert means

@steve228uk I can't help myself a lot of the time. Especially when they are like "love your content"
Which specific bit did you love?
@steve228uk sorry, that was a very binary answer - wanted to get it out before you hit send, obv do what you want, reads fine!
@steve228uk don't respond, proves the account is active and he has a chance
A common one for me is `git checkout master && git pull origin master` or `git clone .. && cd ..` https://t.co/IMyCavT1HN
A small thing but do try and get into the habit of chaining your terminal commands with && - lots of little amounts of time saved on waiting

@IanRobinson ah, so it is the pain talking? (seriously though, stay well!)
@xxiainxx the official flag of NI is the Union Flag. Which is why it was the one that was flown above city hall etc.
@xxiainxx I was complaining about this last night, then someone pointed out the flag I am guessing we're both thinking of isn't official
@IanRobinson that is just the caffeine talking Ian. Have another.
